<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="ApplicationForm">0344f66a2fa33010545d56f62799b631</macroponent><name>SwitchAlertHide</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	api.setState('alert_hide', !api.state.alert_hide);

	return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-26 07:37:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>a373d8392fc00110545d56f62799b684</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SwitchAlertHide</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OrderManagement" source="x_662584_orderma_0">a4e078ca2f233010545d56f62799b63c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OrderManagement">a4e078ca2f233010545d56f62799b63c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a373d8392fc00110545d56f62799b684</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-16 15:16:04</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
